skills.title: HTML
skills.description: Proficient in creating the structure and content of web pages, using tags to format text, insert images, links, and other media elements.

skills.title: CSS
skills.description: Skilled in applying styles and layouts to web content, ensuring visually appealing and responsive designs.

skills.title: TypeScript
skills.description: Experienced in using TypeScript to enhance JavaScript by adding static typing, enabling better code quality.

skills.title: React
skills.description: Proficient in building interactive and dynamic web applications using React, a popular JavaScript library for creating user interfaces.

skills.title: Redux Toolkit
skills.description: Well-versed in managing application state using Redux Toolkit, simplifying state management and enabling predictable data flow.

skills.title: Tailwind
skills.description: Proficient in using Tailwind CSS for efficient and consistent web design through a utility-first approach.
